author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL MOVING INTO THE SOUTH CENTRAL GULF OF MEXICO... ...EXPECTED TO INTENSIFY THIS WEEKEND AS IT MOVES TOWARD THE SOUTH  TEXAS COAST...
summary:
...BERYL MOVING INTO THE SOUTH CENTRAL GULF OF MEXICO... ...EXPECTED TO INTENSIFY THIS WEEKEND AS IT MOVES TOWARD THE SOUTH  TEXAS COAST...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Sat Jul 6
 the center of Beryl was located near 21.9, -90.8
 with movement WNW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
